text: Niscaya yisakale e'i apabada racana karaiche, sihamta tomalokarae'i eta dala; iyaka tomaloke tomalokara babe anistakara buli nabhabiba; baram e'ito tomalokara babe kalyanakara; arasye sihamta pratyekarae babe ache sihamtara papakarmara phala kintu sihamtara majata yiye e'i bisaye pradhana bhumika palana karaiche, tara babe ache mahasasti
